title: PyCon 2009: Behind the scenes of EveryBlock.com (#111)
description:
PyCon 2009: Behind the scenes of EveryBlock.com by Adrian Holovaty

Adrian Holovaty, bad-boy YouTube guitar star (search for him, if you
dare!) and co-author of the Django web framework, takes you under the
hood of EveryBlock.com, a Knight Foundation News Challenge startup which
rounds up local news and information, and is powered 100% by Python and
Django.

[VIDEO HAS ISSUES: Audio humming]
